title: False or misleading information
context: [ยง431:14A-115] Denial, cancellation, and termination. The company may deny coverage or renewal of an existing policy or may terminate an existing policy of a policyholder or applicant for: (1) Nonpayment of an undisputed premium; (2) Refusal to permit on-site workplace safety examinations; (3) Failure to comply with workplace safety and health programs required by the company; or (4) Failure to accurately disclose information concerning the applicant&rsquo;s or policyholder&rsquo;s ownership, change of ownership, operations, or payroll, including the allocation of payroll among state and federal compensation programs, and other information necessary for the board to determine premium rates. [L 1996, c 261, pt of ยง2]
